children.value: A cell is a single display item in the list.
can be used alone or in combination with
can provide upper and lower outer borders for

props.code:
<z-cell-group>
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" />
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" label="description information" />
</z-cell-group>

children.value: Cells can be converted to rounded card style through the

props.code:
<z-cell-group inset>
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" />
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" label="description information" />
</z-cell-group>

children.value: The size of the cell can be controlled through the

props.code:
<z-cell title="cell" value="content" size="large" />
<z-cell title="cell" value="content" size="large" label="description information" />

children.value: Display the icon to the left of the title via the

props.code:
<z-cell-group>
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" icon="appstore" />
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" icon="setting" />
</z-cell-group>

children.value: property, an arrow will be displayed on the right side of the cell, and the arrow direction can be controlled through the

props.code:
<z-cell title="cell" is-link />
<z-cell title="cell" is-link value="content" />
<z-cell title="cell" is-link arrow-direction="down" value="content" />

children.value: The group title can be specified through the

props.code:
<z-cell-group title="Group 1">
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" />
</z-cell-group>
<z-cell-group title="Group 2">
   <z-cell title="cell" value="content" />
</z-cell-group>

children.value: If the above usage does not meet your needs, you can use slots to customize the content.

props.code:
<z-cell value="content" is-link>
   <!-- Use the title slot to customize the title -->
   <template #title>
     <text class="custom-title">Cell</text>
     <z-tag type="primary">tag</z-tag>
   </template>
</z-cell>

<z-cell title="cell" icon="creditcard">
   <!-- Use the right-icon slot to customize the right icon -->
   <template #right-icon>
     <z-icon name="search" class="search-icon" />
   </template>
</z-cell>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.demo-cell {
   .custom-title {
     margin-right: 10rpx;
   }
}
</style>

children.value: <!-- Use the title slot to customize the title -->
<!-- Use the right-icon slot to customize the right icon -->

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
